question: Who among the following Urdu poets was invited to the Second and Third round Table Conference?
explanation: Sir Muhammad Iqbal, widely known as Allama Iqbal, was a poet, philosopher and politician, as well as an academic, barrister and scholar in British India who is widely regarded as having inspired the Pakistan Movement. He is called the "Spiritual Father of Pakistan." He was invited to the Second and Third round table conference.
